mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.order_no AS "orderNo", a.gid AS "xhGoods.id", a.uid AS "xhUser.id", (select xhUser.username from xh_user xhUser where xhUser.id = a.uid) AS "xhUser.username", a.rec_user AS "recUser", a.rec_phone AS "recPhone", a.rec_addr AS "recAddr", a.amount AS "amount", a.pay_method AS "payMethod", a.pay_status AS "payStatus", a.order_status AS "orderStatus", a.rec_date AS "recDate", a.rec_time AS "recTime", a.order_detail AS "orderDetail", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.comment AS "comment"
mapper.select: select a.order_no AS "orderNo" from xh_order a order by a.update_date DESC limit 0,1
select count(1) from xh_order a where a.pay_status = '1';
SELECT count(1) from xh_order a where a.pay_status = '2';
SELECT sum(amount) from xh_order where pay_status = '2';
SELECT sum(amount) AS amount,create_date AS createDate from xh_order where pay_status='2' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%Y%m%d') ORDER BY create_date DESC limit 7;
SELECT sum(amount) AS amount FROM xh_order WHERE pay_status = '2' AND to_days(create_date) = to_days(now());
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO xh_order( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, order_no, gid, uid, rec_user, rec_phone, rec_addr, amount, pay_method, pay_status, order_status, rec_date, rec_time, order_detail, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{orderNo}, #{xhGoods.id}, #{xhUser.id}, #{recUser}, #{recPhone}, #{recAddr}, #{amount}, #{payMethod}, #{payStatus}, #{orderStatus}, #{recDate}, #{recTime}, #{orderDetail}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE xh_order SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, order_no=#{orderNo}, gid = #{xhGoods.id}, uid = #{xhUser.id}, rec_user = #{recUser}, rec_phone = #{recPhone}, rec_addr = #{recAddr}, amount = #{amount}, pay_method = #{payMethod}, pay_status = #{payStatus}, order_status = #{orderStatus}, rec_date = #{recDate}, rec_time = #{recTime}, order_detail=#{orderDetail}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
